item.title: 5 things you need to know about Autodesk's new games engine
item.description:
5 things you need to know about Autodesk's new games engine

Most people Autodesk from its pro level tools Maya and 3DS Max. But now it's taking on the likes of Unreal Engine 4 and Unity 5 by releasing Stingray, a game engine for smaller studios that can be customized without a huge amount of programming.

item.title: Microsoft Jumps 6% On Profit, Revenue Beat In Its FQ1
item.description:
Microsoft Jumps 6% On Profit, Revenue Beat In Its FQ1

Today Microsoft reported the financial performance it recorded during the first quarter of its fiscal 2016. Microsoft generated $0.67 in adjusted per-share profit off non-GAAP revenue of $21.66 billion in the three-month period. Analysts had expected the Redmond-based software shop to earn $0.59 per share, on revenue of $21.03 billion.

item.title: TechCrunch
item.description:
TechCrunch

TechCrunch is a leading technology media property, dedicated to obsessively profiling startups, reviewing new Internet products, and breaking tech news.

item.title: Google Says It Will Not De-List Entire Sites For Copyright Violations
item.description:
Google Says It Will Not De-List Entire Sites For Copyright Violations

In an open letter to the Office and Management and Budget's Intellectual Property Enforcement Coordinator, Google announced today that it opposes the practice of removing entire sites from search results. Google's letter is in response to a public solicitation by Daniel H. Marti, the United States Intellectual Property Enforcement Coordinator.

item.title: Unity - Game engine, tools and multiplatform
item.description:
Unity - Game engine, tools and multiplatform

What is Unity? Experience polished, end-to-end multiplatform development. Confidently target today's hottest platforms and the ones that will shape the future. Efficiently optimize performance with cross-platform tools and deploy with near one-click ease. More about multiplatform Get the best of both worlds with Unity: high-end tools in a ready-made solution that's also intuitive to use and deeply customizable.
